item.title: TAA by Snowy Moon v10.2.0 ETS2
item.description:
TAA by Snowy Moon v10.2.0 ETS2

A high quality and high performance time antialiasing (TAA) solution has been implemented, as well as DLSS/DLAA support for NVIDIA GPUs. Shadow and SSA O improvements Settings: Press the “END”or”CTRL+P” key to open the game menu.TAA Clarity-reduce TAA blur * TAA Clarity is designed for people who want to get less blurry and clearer results, close to the result without smoothing, for example, for VR users. Sharpen Edges-adjust the sharpness for a ligned edges when usingTAAClarity/+.TAA level-The higher, the smoother FXAA is the 2nd smoothing method to improve edges T.Shadow-Prevents shadows from flickering Use with ReShade You can use this method with any other mod/plugin using dxgi.dll.

Create a folder named”reshade”in the “bin\win_x64″folder. Place all the files of ReShade (or any other mod/plugin)in the folder”bin\win_x64\reshade”or select the folder”bin\win_x64\reshade”in the ReShade installer. For the ETS21.50version of the game, ATS1.50



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Slow Traffic Vehicles v1.1 ATS
item.description:
Slow Traffic Vehicles v1.1 ATS

v.1.1
– 3 new vehicles added

This mod adds some slow traffic vehicles into basic traffic (cities, highways etc.). They have reduced top speed (and also realistic engine settings and mass), causing traffic jams and more complicated road conditions.
All the vehicles are from SCS files, but these vehicles do not show on roads for some reason. But now they do, after a little tweaks from the def side.

Here is the list of new vehicle units added:
– Chevy Pickup Truck
– Combine Harvester
– Countryside Pickup Truck
– Sweeper
– Tractor
– Wolverine ATV
– Yard Truck
– Utilimaster Van (new in v.1.1)
– Outrider UTV (new in v.1.1)
– Mack RD Dumper (new in v.1.1)
And also some semi-trucks with low-power engines and daycabs:
– Freightliner Cascadia 2019
– Mack Anthem
– Peterbilt 389
– Kenworth T680
– Volvo VNL 2014

Mod manager priority: any; I’d recommend installing it somwhere alongside other traffic mods.
Other mods compatibility: should work with other mods (traffic, sounds etc.).
Game version: tested in 1.50 but might work with other versions too (not guaranteed though).



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: H&W Iveco S-Way 2019 v1.3.3 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
H&W Iveco S-Way 2019 v1.3.3 1.50 ETS2

Changelogs 1.3.3
– Fixed crash for AT interior
– Remove unused files
– Compatibility for 1.50

Features
– 6 chassics included low deck
– EU and UK Interior
– 12 engines included 3 LNG engines and badges
– All Iveco RAL colors
– 3 exclusive skins + template(skin and PNGs)
– Own Iveco sound by Kriechbaum
– More then 110 exterior parts
– More then 50 parts for interior if you own the cabin DLC from SCS. ( Def for Cabin DLC is included)
– Completly new designed dashboard with 3 screens
– Compatible with signs on your truck, BC-Belka accessory
– Compatible with Interior Addon by Wolli (actuilly not all parts for UK Interior)

You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Schwarzmuller KOS T3/E by Gloover v1.1 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Schwarzmuller KOS T3/E by Gloover v1.1 1.50 ETS2

This Add-On adds a new standalone Schwarzmuller KOS T3/E 3-axle refrigerated box-body semitrailer to Euro Truck Simulator 2.

The Schwarzmuller KOS T3/E features
– Some options to individualize it
– Different pallet boxes
– Mudflaps
– Different rear light options and more

Compatibility for ETS2 1.50



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Previous soundproofing 2024MAY30 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Previous soundproofing 2024MAY30 1.50 ETS2

New in version 2024MAY30: Added soundproofing for the 2023 Renault E-Tech T.
This mod brings back a similar soundproofing from 1.42 for ETS2 default trucks affected by the 1.43 interior cabin sound update.
Newer default trucks from after 1.43 also get this treatment but with only small changes as necessary.

Features:
– Stops in-cab sounds from being louder than when the camera is outside and next to the engine.
– Reduces the excess reverb in the cabin.
– Lowers sound volume of high pitch sounds such as turbo when windows are closed.

You can enable this mod with low priority in the Mod Manager if you want.
Modders are welcome to use the baseline settings provided in this mod for sound_effects_units.sui
Tip: Do not stray too far in increasing gain values, because it may affect all sounds such as traffic and ambient sounds.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
